project.name: Privacy Gecko
project.tagline: Real Privacy Tools. Real Protection. Real Results.
project.description: Privacy Gecko is building a comprehensive ecosystem of privacy-first tools backed by real development, measurable progress, and a mission to make privacy accessible to everyone.
project.mission: To empower individuals with practical privacy tools that actually work, backed by transparent development and proven results.

publicSale.description: Fair launch allocation for community participation

development.description: Vested over 24 months for ecosystem growth

team.description: Locked for 12 months, vested over 18 months

utility.description: PRICKO token provides access to premium features across the Privacy Gecko ecosystem
benefits: Access to premium tiers in Gecko Share, Gecko View, and other tools
Governance rights for ecosystem development decisions
Discounted pricing on all Privacy Gecko services
Priority access to beta features and new product launches

disclaimers.homepage: PRICKO is a utility token for accessing Privacy Gecko's ecosystem of privacy tools. It is not an investment vehicle or security. Token value may fluctuate. Purchase only if you intend to use Privacy Gecko services.
disclaimers.tokenomics: This token is designed solely for utility within the Privacy Gecko ecosystem. It grants access to premium features, governance participation, and service discounts. This is not financial advice. Cryptocurrency investments carry risk, including total loss of capital. PRICKO tokens are not securities and make no promises of profit. Conduct your own research before purchasing.
disclaimers.roadmap: All timelines and features are subject to change based on development progress and market conditions. This roadmap represents current intentions, not guarantees. Token holders have no expectation of profit from the efforts of the Privacy Gecko team.

geckoAdvisor.name: Gecko Advisor
geckoAdvisor.subtitle: Website Privacy Scanner
geckoAdvisor.description: Scan any website to uncover trackers, cookies, and hidden data collection. Open-source privacy analysis tool that grades websites A-F based on their privacy practices. 100% free with no account required.

geckoShare.name: Gecko Share
geckoShare.subtitle: Zero-Knowledge File Sharing
geckoShare.description: Zero-knowledge, token-gated file-sharing SaaS with instant uploads and persistent vault storage. End-to-end encrypted file sharing with expiring links.

geckoShell.name: Gecko Shell
geckoShell.subtitle: Cross-Platform Mobile Privacy Browser
geckoShell.description: Cross-platform mobile privacy browser with Solana wallet integration and privacy toolkit SDK. Features plugin system architecture for extensibility.

security.auditStatus: Beta security audit in progress Q4 2024

geckoGuard.name: Gecko Guard
geckoGuard.subtitle: Tracker & Ad Blocker
geckoGuard.description: Block trackers and ads automatically. Privacy protection that works in any browser.

security.architecture: Client-side processing (no data sent to servers)
security.auditStatus: Community security review completed - awaiting store approval

geckoLock.name: Gecko Lock
geckoLock.subtitle: Zero-Knowledge Password Manager
geckoLock.description: Zero-knowledge password manager with AES-256 encryption and cross-platform sync. Your master password never leaves your device.

geckoWatch.name: Gecko Watch
geckoWatch.subtitle: Privacy Compliance Analyzer
geckoWatch.description: Analyze and monitor privacy compliance of websites with GDPR checking and cookie analysis. Real-time monitoring for privacy policy changes.

geckoView.name: Gecko View
geckoView.subtitle: AI Content Summarization
geckoView.description: AI-powered content summarization with end-to-end encrypted bookmarks. Save and summarize web articles using GPT-3.5 and GPT-4.

security.encryption: AES-256 for stored content and bookmarks
security.architecture: Hybrid - AI processing on secure servers, data encrypted

geckoVPN.name: Gecko VPN
geckoVPN.subtitle: Privacy-First VPN
geckoVPN.description: Privacy-first VPN with no-logs policy, kill switch, and multi-hop routing. Global server network in 50+ countries.

security.encryption: AES-256 with WireGuard and OpenVPN protocols
security.architecture: RAM-only servers with automatic data wiping

Token utility integrated across all 8 products

members.name: DesignGecko
members.bio: Design thinking meets privacy-first principles. Creates intuitive experiences for complex security tools.

testimonials.quote: Finally, file sharing I can actually trust. GeckoShare's zero-knowledge encryption gives me peace of mind when sharing sensitive documents.
testimonials.author: Marcus T.

testimonials.quote: GeckoAdvisor scanned my favorite websites and revealed 23 trackers I had no idea were collecting my data. The privacy grades make it easy to see which sites respect privacy.
testimonials.author: Sarah K.

testimonials.quote: Most crypto projects promise the moon. Privacy Gecko shipped real products before asking for a dime. That's the kind of team I trust.
testimonials.author: James L.

testimonials.quote: The beta of GeckoShell is incredibly smooth. Can't wait for the full release. Mobile privacy browsing finally done right.
testimonials.author: Alex M.

testimonials.quote: Open source, security audits completed, and real traction. Privacy Gecko is proof over promises, every single time.
testimonials.author: Dev Chen

testimonials.quote: I've tested dozens of website privacy scanners. GeckoAdvisor's A-F grading system is brilliant - it makes complex privacy analysis accessible to everyone. No account, completely free, and open source.
testimonials.author: Linda R.

complianceNotes.securities: PRICKO is designed as a utility token for ecosystem access, not as a security. It does not represent equity, ownership, or profit-sharing rights.
complianceNotes.jurisdiction: Token availability and compliance varies by jurisdiction. Verify local regulations before purchase.
complianceNotes.kyc: KYC/AML procedures may be required based on purchase method and jurisdiction.

questions.question: What is PRICKO?
questions.answer: PRICKO ($PRICKO) is a utility token that powers the Privacy Gecko ecosystem of privacy-first tools. Unlike typical meme coins, PRICKO provides real utility by granting access to premium features across 8 privacy tools. We've already launched 2 live products serving 2,100+ users, with 2 more at 90%+ completion.

questions.question: Is PRICKO an investment?
questions.answer: No. PRICKO is a utility token designed to provide access to Privacy Gecko's ecosystem of privacy tools. It is NOT an investment vehicle, security, or promise of profit. You should only purchase PRICKO if you intend to use Privacy Gecko's services. Token value may fluctuate, and you could lose your entire investment.

questions.question: Why should I trust PRICKO over other crypto projects?
questions.answer: Privacy Gecko has shipped 2 live products (GeckoShare and GeckoAdvisor) before asking for investment. We're 100% open source with completed security audits, and we've attracted 1,800+ beta testers. We believe in 'proof over promises' - our working products speak for themselves.

questions.question: Why Solana?
questions.answer: Solana offers the speed and low transaction costs necessary for everyday utility. With sub-second transaction times and minimal fees, users can access premium features instantly without worrying about gas costs eating into their benefits.

questions.question: What is the total supply of PRICKO?
questions.answer: The total supply is fixed at 1 billion (1,000,000,000) PRICKO tokens. There will never be more tokens created, ensuring no dilution from future minting.

questions.question: How are PRICKO tokens distributed?
questions.answer: Distribution: 40% Public Sale (400M), 30% Liquidity Pool (300M locked), 15% Development (150M with 24-month vesting), 10% Marketing (100M), 5% Team (50M with 12-month lock + 18-month vesting). The team has minimal allocation and long lock periods to align incentives with the community.

questions.question: How do I buy PRICKO tokens?
questions.answer: Once launched, PRICKO will be available on Solana DEXs like Raydium and Jupiter. We'll announce the official launch date and provide step-by-step purchase guides. Currently, you can join our whitelist for early access notifications.

questions.question: Can I stake PRICKO tokens?
questions.answer: Yes! Staking will be available starting Q1 2026, approximately 3 months after the public launch. Stakers will earn rewards and gain additional governance rights. Details on APY and lock periods will be announced closer to the staking launch.

questions.question: What can I do with PRICKO tokens?
questions.answer: PRICKO tokens unlock premium features across all Privacy Gecko tools. Instead of paying monthly subscriptions, you can hold tokens to access Pro features. You also get governance rights to vote on ecosystem priorities, discounts on services, and priority access to new product launches.

questions.question: How does token access compare to subscriptions?
questions.answer: Token holders enjoy lifetime access to premium features as long as they hold the required amount. Subscriptions cost $9.99/month per product, while holding 10,000 PRICKO tokens grants the same access without recurring payments. For multiple products, token holdings scale better than subscription bundles.

questions.question: What governance rights do token holders have?
questions.answer: Token holders can vote on ecosystem development priorities, propose new privacy tools, and participate in feature roadmap decisions. The DAO governance portal launches in Q1 2026, giving the community direct influence over the project's direction.

questions.question: How many tokens do I need to hold for premium access?
questions.answer: Requirements vary by product and tier. For example: Single Product Pro access requires ~10,000 PRICKO, 3-Product Bundle requires ~25,000 PRICKO, and All 8 Products requires ~50,000 PRICKO. These thresholds may be adjusted based on token value and community feedback.

questions.question: Which products are live right now?
questions.answer: Currently, GeckoShare (encrypted file sharing with Pro tier) and GeckoAdvisor (website privacy scanner - 100% free) are live and serving users. GeckoAdvisor scans any website to reveal trackers and privacy practices with no account required.

questions.question: What's launching next?
questions.answer: GeckoGuard (AI ad blocker browser extension) is at 90% completion and in Chrome Web Store review, expected in Q3 2025. GeckoShell (mobile privacy browser) is in beta with 850+ testers. GeckoLock (password manager) is at 65% completion, targeting Q4 2025.

questions.question: Do the products work without holding tokens?
questions.answer: Yes! All products have free tiers that work without any token holdings. Tokens unlock premium features and remove limitations, but basic functionality is always available to everyone.

questions.question: Are the products open source?
questions.answer: Yes, all Privacy Gecko products are 100% open source. You can review the code on our GitHub (github.com/privacygecko) and verify our privacy and security claims independently. We believe transparency is essential for privacy tools.

questions.question: Do I need a crypto wallet to use Privacy Gecko tools?
questions.answer: For basic free features, no wallet is required. To access premium features via token holdings, you'll need a Solana-compatible wallet like Phantom, Solflare, or Backpack. Wallet integration is optional for free tier users.

questions.question: How does Privacy Gecko protect my data?
questions.answer: We use zero-knowledge architecture wherever possible, meaning your data never touches our servers. For tools like GeckoShare, files are encrypted client-side before upload. We can't access your data even if we wanted to. All products undergo independent security audits.

questions.question: Do the tools work on mobile?
questions.answer: Yes! GeckoShare and GeckoAdvisor work on mobile browsers. GeckoShell is a dedicated mobile app (currently in beta) with native iOS and Android support. All web-based tools are mobile-responsive.

questions.question: Have the products been security audited?
questions.answer: Yes. GeckoShare and GeckoAdvisor have completed independent security audits in Q4 2024. Audit reports are publicly available on our GitHub. Products currently in development will undergo audits before public launch.

questions.question: How can I join the community?
questions.answer: Join our Discord server, Telegram group, or follow us on Twitter @PrivacyGecko. We have an active community of privacy advocates, developers, and early adopters who help shape the ecosystem's direction.

questions.question: Can I beta test new products?
questions.answer: Yes! We regularly invite community members to test products in development. Join our Discord and opt into the Beta Tester role to get early access to GeckoLock, GeckoBrowser, and other upcoming tools.

questions.question: Can I contribute to development?
questions.answer: Absolutely! All our code is open source on GitHub. We welcome contributions ranging from bug fixes to new features. Check our GitHub Issues page for good first issues, or propose your own improvements.

questions.question: What is the whitelist for?
questions.answer: The whitelist gives early supporters priority access to the token launch and potential pre-sale opportunities. Whitelist members also get exclusive updates, early product access, and community perks. Join via our Contact page.
